summary: Teiko's new husband disappears on a business trip. She discovers a pair of mysterious postcards hidden away in a book that may be clues to his fate.
cast: Yoshiko Kuga|Hizuru Takachiho|Ineko Arima|Kôji Nanbara|Kô Nishimura|Sadako Sawamura|Yoshi Katô|Tatsuo Nagai|Mutsuko Sakura|Takanobu Hozumi|Hisao Toake|Masao Oda|Takamaru Sasaki|Toyo Takahashi|Isao Arase|Kenji Ashihara|Mitsuko Ema|Junko Hara|Kentarô Imai|Zenichi Inagawa|Akio Isono|Michiko Katsura|Masanao Kawakane|Kazuo Kobayashi|Tazuko Kusaka|Reiko Minakami|Mitsuyo Mizushima|Kiyo Murakami|Akira Naganuma|Kôsuke Nono|Isao Suenaga|Ryôko Suzuki|Nobuo Takagi|Yoshino Tani|Fumio Tooyama|Shûgo Yamada|Kimiyo Ôtsuka
title: Zero no shôten
